name: Un Jardin sur le Nil Eu de Toilette Travel Spray
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Classic Woods.Key Notes:Green Mango, Lotus Blossom, Incense, Sycamore Wood.Fragrance Description:This fragrance evokes a garden full of life, generous and sparkling, where the scents of green mango, lotus blossom, calamus, and rush blend with incense and sycamore wood..About the Fragrance:Un Jardin sur le Nil is an impressionistic stroll through the island gardens on the Nile at Aswan, the starting point for a new olfactory adventure.
ingredients: Alcohol, Water, Fragrance, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Geraniol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Citral. ..Percent alcohol: 75%
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

shades.shade_name: 0.5 oz / 15 mL eau de toilette spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The second I opened up the box I immediately fell in love with this fragrance.  The smell is immaculate and itu2019s nothing like Iu2019ve ever smelt before. This is my definite absolute favorite top one I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent, but wish it lasted all day.  I usually have to re-apply by lunch time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this one for a long time and I LOVE IT. Its so fresh and clean and delicious. And the size is great to have it in your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent, however it fades quickly, otherwise it is rated a 5 star.

reviews.review_title: Fresh citrusy goodness but doesnu2019t last long!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this smells but it does not last long enough to be appreciated sadly! Definitely more of a fresh and citrusy scent good for the summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this when I tried it at the shop.  Decided to take a chance.  Wore it once and it came across very powdery and too floral for me.  I prefer wood, vanilla and tobacco bases.  My niece got a treat though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a full size last year and ordered this one to have in my purse. I love its fresh clean scent and doesnu2019t give me headache unlike other perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's a nice, fresh, citrus scent. my husband said it smells like lemon zest. but the dry down is really good once it combined with the chemistry of your skin. it's a beautiful, fresh and clean scent. good for spring and summer. to make it more long lasting, I would spray it on a moisturize skin. put unscented lotion first and then spray the it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this smell because itu2019s so fresh and clean. Itu2019s light enough for me to wear to work. My only problem is that it doesnu2019t last long at all. Maybe an hour or two tops.

reviews.review_title: Finally, a purse size is available!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been buying this Hermes perfume since I stayed in Biarritz and the hotel provided a beautiful toiletry bag of Hermes products...probably about 25 years ago.  I was thrilled to see this travel size spray in store and immediately picked it up.  Maybe it's been around but it was the first time I've seen this smaller size anywhere.
